plugins.name: Sitemap Generator Vysota
plugins.description:
Generate a visual sitemap from any valid sitemap.xml file.


Automatically creates a structured site map with:

  1. Tree layout with directional connectors
  2. Up to 2000 URLs
  3. Depth control (1–10 levels)
  4. Support for Squares, Stickies, or Text objects
  5. Optional link display (link: https://...)
  6. Auto-resizing nodes
  7. Ignore branches containing specific URLs
  8. Choose to start layout from top or center of the canvas

Ideal for:

  1. Content planning
  2. IA/UX audits
  3. SEO visualizations


💡 Works entirely offline – just load your sitemap.xml and go!

Built for FigJam.
plugins.tagline: Visualize your sitemap as a clear, connected tree map directly in FigJam.

plugins.name: Connect Styles
plugins.description:
Color styles sometimes get detached. It can be time consuming to manually reconnect them all.


Connect Styles is the super easy fix for this:


1) Scan your page for detached Color Styles

2) Reconnect colors to their Color Styles


That's it! You can either reconnect all Color Styles at once, or one at the time for more control.


Pricing

You can use this plugin 3 times for free. Figma doesn't allow paid plugins to go cheaper dan $2 per month. Thats why the yearly plan has a discount of 63%, so that the total price of a license is only $8,88


Cancelation


Subscriptions are handled by Figma. You can cancel the plugin subscription by:


Clicking your profile avatar in the top-left corner of Figma

Click Settings

Click Community and find the section Community purchases.

Click the three dots ... next to Skew It Let's Do It

Click Manage subscription

In the newly opened Stripe portal, select Cancel Plan


Cheers and stay connected! ♡

accepted.name: lonecaptain
accepted.description: Plugin Powerrrrr

plugins.tagline: Reconnect detached Color Styles

plugins.name: DIY Mockup Maker
plugins.description:
🎨 Playground file


📲 The DIY Mockup Maker lets you batch-create in-device mockups using any device you choose.


🌎 You can use any asset from a Community library, or create your own mockup device. As long as it has a frame called content inside, it'll work.


🏞️ You can choose to add your design as a PNG instead, which can be useful for file performance. It has its limitations though.


ℹ️ How to use it

  1. Select a template frame (your device), and make sure there is a frame inside called "content"
  2. Click on "Set Mockup Template". This template will remain assigned until you choose to change it.
  3. Select the frame(s) you want to add to your mockup. If multiple frames are selected, multiple mockups will be created.
  4. Click on "Generate Mockup(s)"


This is a work in progress. Any feedback is welcome!

accepted.name: alfonso
accepted.description:
Designer and artist from Uruguay, based in New York City.

Currently Director, Product Design at Fabric Health. Ex. Particle Health

plugins.tagline: Batch-create in-device mockups using any device you choose

plugins.name: Text Find Replace
plugins.description:
Find & Replace Plugin for Figma

Effortlessly streamline your design workflow with the Find & Replace plugin for Figma. This intuitive tool allows you to quickly identify and modify selected text layers across your design, enhancing your efficiency and ensuring consistency in your typography.


Key Features:


User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate through the plugin with a clean and straightforward layout. Enter the text you want to find and the text you wish to replace it with in just a few clicks.


Dynamic Text Highlighting: As you type in the "Find" field, matching text within the selected layers is instantly highlighted, providing a clear visual cue to help you confirm your selection before making any changes.


Preview of Changes: View a live preview of selected text, with matching words bolded and replaced text shown next to them. This feature allows you to visualize changes before applying them, ensuring you achieve the desired outcome.


Bulk Replacement: Replace multiple instances of text across various layers simultaneously, saving you time and effort. Whether it's a single word or a phrase, you can modify your design's language with ease.


Instant Feedback: Receive notifications upon completion of text replacements, ensuring you’re informed of the changes made.


Cancel Option: If you change your mind, simply hit the cancel button to revert any unsaved changes, giving you peace of mind as you work.


With the Find & Replace plugin, enhance your design process by eliminating tedious text editing tasks and maintaining uniformity in your projects. Try it today and experience the difference in your Figma workflow!


Icon Credits :

<a href="https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/search" title="search icons">Search icons created by Dimitry Miroliubov - Flaticon</a>
plugins.tagline: find and replace selected text easily

plugins.name: Interlinked
plugins.description:
Interlined makes it easy to navigate in Design Mode within Figma file, even across pages.


When you run Interlinked for the first time, it will create ‘interlink’ component for you.


Restyle your links

You can change the component whatever you like, but it must have ‘interlink’ text node to work.


Use your components

You can also use Interlinked with your components of choice, as long as they have a text node named 'interlink'. Select 2 instances and run Interlined from the Command Palette (`Cmd+/`).


Set default component

Now when you run the plugin on custom components you can set is as default from toast notification. Next time you run Interlined without selection, links will be created using new components.


Fix broken link

Links can and will bet broken when you change the text of the link, or if you copy and paste the node. Run the plugin from the Design Panel, then the node is selected to get the link fixed.


Works with interactions

You can enable Presentation mode interactions from the Design Panel and the page level. It’s off by default because it can lead to a messy workspace, and Figma creates a starting point, which you probably don't need.

accepted.name: Juri
accepted.description: Designer @ Large

plugins.tagline: Link two nodes together to navigate in Design mode. Within Figma Interlinked. Interlinked.

85245.description:

Now when you run the plugin on custom components you can set is as default from toast notification. Next time you run Interlined without selection, links will be created using new components.


Fix broken link

Links can and will bet broken when you change the text of the link, or if you copy and paste the node. Run the plugin from the Design Panel, then the node is selected to get the link fixed.


Works with interactions

You can enable Presentation mode interactions from the Design Panel and the page level. It’s off by default because it can lead to a messy workspace, and Figma creates a starting point, which you probably don't need.
85245.release_notes: fixing presentation mode on-click linking as it was borked by the changes in Figma API. Should be good now, but remember that presentation mode interactions are off by default and you have to toggle the thing after you first use the plugin.
85245.tagline: Link two nodes together to navigate in Design mode. Within Figma Interlinked. Interlinked.

plugins.name: Local Styler
plugins.description:
Local Styler is the must-have Figma plugin that simplifies your workflow by automating the creation of local styles. Whether you’re working on color palettes, font hierarchies, effects, or grid systems, Local Styler transforms your design process with just a single click. It’s designed to help you achieve consistency, efficiency, and a professional look across all your Figma projects.


Why Choose Local Styler for Local Styles in Figma?

Local Styler is specifically crafted to optimize local styles in Figma, making your designs cohesive and your workflow seamless. Here’s how it works:


1. Color Styles & Palette Generator

  1. Automatically generate color palettes, including tonal variations, neutral colors, and state styles (hover, active, disabled).
  2. Save all color configurations directly as local styles in Figma for quick access and reuse.
  3. Ensure your color choices remain consistent across different screens and components.


2. Font Hierarchy Builder

  1. Create a complete typography hierarchy, including H1, H2, P1, and more.
  2. Define your preferred font, weight, and sizes, and have Local Styler save them as local styles.
  3. Achieve professional typography without manual adjustments every time.


3. Effect Creation

  1. Add depth and polish to your designs with ready-made shadow effects and blur effects.
  2. Save these effects as reusable local styles to maintain consistency in your design system.
  3. Experiment with various styles quickly and efficiently without repetitive setups.


4. Grid System Setup

  1. Automate the creation of grid systems for desktop, tablet, and mobile layouts.
  2. Save all grid configurations as local styles, ensuring responsive and precise designs.
  3. Spend less time on alignment and more on creativity.

accepted.name: Kaan Kiziltug
accepted.description: I'm Kaan Kızıltuğ, a passionate and creative designer with a focus on bringing innovative ideas to life. I'm also behind the Local Styler plugin.

plugins.tagline: Generate color palettes, typography, effects, and grids as local styles—instantly!

128234.name: Local Styler
128234.description:

Whether you’re working on color palettes, font hierarchies, effects, or grid systems, Local Styler transforms your design process with just a single click. 128234.release_notes:
-Add to variables feature added
Now users can automatically add the colours they specify to both local styles and local variables.

-Can be exported as tokens. 
Users can export design tokens in JSON, SCSS, Tailwind, JS/TS formats.

-The interface has been renewed.
With a more modern interface, the selected colour can be seen simultaneously with its shades.
Up to 5 colours can be added.

-Font search feature
font search input has been improved and works better

-Fonts are now added as Display, Headline, Body and Label.
This change was made for ease of use. Also H1, H2 versions will come in the next update.

Performance improvements.
128234.tagline: Generate color palettes, typography, effects, and grids as local styles—instantly!

plugins.name: FlatFaces - Profile Placeholder
plugins.description:
FlatFaces: Simplify Profile Placeholders with Style


---


FlatFaces is your go-to Figma plugin for creating sleek, professional profile placeholders in just one click. Instantly apply lightweight, plain-background profile images to any shape, ensuring a clean and minimal look for your UI designs.


Perfect for designers who value simplicity and efficiency, FlatFaces enhances your workflow while keeping your interfaces modern and polished.


Say goodbye to placeholder clutter and hello to effortless design consistency!


As always, stay awesome 🙌.


---


👉 How to use plugin:

1. Select any shape

2. Run the plugin, and it will fill with a random photo 📸.

plugins.name: GPTの设计锦囊
plugins.description:
🚀 Unleash Your Creativity With ChatGPT🚀


欢迎使用设计锦囊！本插件可以帮助你快速打造自己的ChatGPT锦囊，让你的创意随时跃然纸上！


使用方法非常简单，只需几个步骤即可完成：


1. 打开插件，选择创建锦囊；

2. 添加对话内容，规定场景和角色的设定；

3. 点击生成，即可快速得到属于你自己的ChatGPT锦囊！


除此之外，本插件未来还计划支持多模态交互，文档摘要，让你的创意更加灵活多样。不论是设计师还是创作者，都可以用这个插件打造自己的作品，让灵感无限扩展！


Welcome to Design Toolkit!


This plugin can help you quickly create your own ChatGPT toolkit, allowing your creativity to come to life at any time!


The instructions for use are very simple, requiring only a few steps:

  1. Open the plugin and select "Create Toolkit".
  2. Add dialogue content and specify the settings for the scene and characters.
  3. Click "Generate" to quickly obtain your own ChatGPT toolkit!


In addition, this plugin plans to support multimodal interaction and document summarization in the future, making your creativity more flexible and diverse.


Whether you are a designer or a creator, you can use this plugin to create your own work and expand your inspiration limitlessly!
plugins.tagline: 只需几秒钟，打造自己的GPT助手。随时激发灵感，让创意跃然纸上。

plugins.name: Bloom
plugins.description:
Bloom

This little figma plugin helps you to create parameterized flower / star vector shape with ease.

You can explore combinations of parameters to create your own favorite shapes.


Create:

  1. Drag or click the controls to change the shape, preview in realtime on the left side.
  2. Hit "Create" button to add it on the page.


View bezier curve control points of vector shape:

Turn on the 'Show Bezier Controls' switch.


Update:

  1. Select the vector shape created by this plugin.
  2. Change parameters using controls.
  3. The 'Create' button will change to 'Update', just click it.
plugins.tagline: Create, edit dynamic flower vector shape with parameters

plugins.name: JSON to Canvas Ninja - fastest way from data to figma Design
plugins.description:
Effortlessly enhance your Figma designs with real data using JSON to Canvas Ninja. Populate your designs with actual product content, making your prototypes accurate, realistic, and production-ready. Say goodbye to placeholder text and lorem ipsum—design with confidence and bring your ideas closer to reality.


  1. generate infinite designs based on one single component, frame or group
  2. populate texts and images
  3. apply to any of your figma layers
  4. super straight forward UI
  5. easily distinguish image data from text data via an icon
  6. upload or paste your JSON (more options coming soon)


Link to a little how-to documentation


Any feedback is welcome. I will check and update the plugin based on it.

plugins.name: 文本提取 Text Extractor Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows you to easily extract text from selected frames and copy it to your clipboard. It’s perfect for designers who need to quickly gather text content from their designs.


Features Introduction

•Extracts text from multiple selected frames

•Automatically arranges text by frame order (left to right, top to bottom)

•Option to copy extracted text to clipboard with one click

•Handles hidden text layers and notifies if no text is found


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames in your Figma design.

2.Click the “Get Text Layers” button to extract text from the selected frames.

3.The extracted text will be displayed in the result area.

4.If text is found, the “Copy to Clipboard” button will appear. Click it to copy the text.

5.If no text is found or if an error occurs, you will receive a notification.


Notes

•Ensure that your frames contain visible text layers for successful extraction.

•The plugin will notify you if no text layers are found or if the selection is invalid.



介绍

此 Figma 插件允许您轻松从所选画板中提取文本，并将其复制到剪贴板。对于需要快速从设计中收集文本内容的设计师来说，这是一个完美的工具。


功能说明

•从多个选定的画板中提取文本

•按画板顺序自动排列文本（从左到右，从上到下）

•一键复制提取的文本到剪贴板

•处理隐藏的文本图层，并在未找到文本时通知


使用方法

1.在您的 Figma 设计中选择一个或多个画板。

2.点击“获取文本图层”按钮，从所选画板中提取文本。

3.提取的文本将显示在结果区域。

4.如果找到文本，“复制到剪贴板”按钮将出现。点击它以复制文本。

5.如果未找到文本或发生错误，您将收到通知。


注意事项

•确保您的画板包含可见的文本图层，以成功提取文本。

•如果未找到文本图层或选择无效，插件会通知您。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Effortlessly extract and copy text from selected frames

136442.name: 文本提取 Text Extractor Pro
136442.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows you to easily extract text from selected frames and copy it to your clipboard. It’s perfect for designers who need to quickly gather text content from their designs.


Features Introduction

•Extracts text from multiple selected frames

•Automatically arranges text by frame order (left to right, top to bottom)

•Option to copy extracted text to clipboard with one click

•Handles hidden text layers and notifies if no text is found


How to Use

1.Select one or more frames in your Figma design.

2.Click the “Get Text Layers” button to extract text from the selected frames.

3.The extracted text will be displayed in the result area.

4.If text is found, the “Copy to Clipboard” button will appear. Click it to copy the text.

5.If no text is found or if an error occurs, you will receive a notification.


Notes

•Ensure that your frames contain visible text layers for successful extraction.

•The plugin will notify you if no text layers are found or if the selection is invalid.



介绍

此 Figma 插件允许您轻松从所选画板中提取文本，并将其复制到剪贴板。对于需要快速从设计中收集文本内容的设计师来说，这是一个完美的工具。


功能说明

•从多个选定的画板中提取文本

•按画板顺序自动排列文本（从左到右，从上到下）

•一键复制提取的文本到剪贴板

•处理隐藏的文本图层，并在未找到文本时通知


使用方法

1.在您的 Figma 设计中选择一个或多个画板。

2.点击“获取文本图层”按钮，从所选画板中提取文本。

3.提取的文本将显示在结果区域。

4.如果找到文本，“复制到剪贴板”按钮将出现。点击它以复制文本。

5.如果未找到文本或发生错误，您将收到通知。


注意事项

•确保您的画板包含可见的文本图层，以成功提取文本。

•如果未找到文本图层或选择无效，插件会通知您。

plugins.name: Ghost Frames
plugins.description:
Transform your text layers into beautiful ghost frames with a single click! Perfect for creating redacted versions of your UI designs, placeholder mockups, or anonymised portfolio pieces.


🎯 Key Features:

  1. Converts any text layer into a rounded rectangle frame
  2. Preserves text colours and styling
  3. Maintains original text dimensions and positioning
  4. Smart opacity based on text size and length
  5. Works with nested components and instances
  6. Handles mixed text styles within layers


✨ Use Cases:

  1. Create clean, minimalist versions of UI designs
  2. Make placeholder/redacted versions for client presentations
  3. Generate anonymised screenshots for portfolios
  4. Prototype loading states and skeleton screens
  5. Create beautiful marketing materials without exposing sensitive content


🛠️ How it works:

Simply select any frame containing text layers and run the plugin. It will automatically convert all text elements into ghost frames whilst preserving their visual hierarchy and styling. The result is a clean, professional representation of your design that maintains visual structure without exposing actual content.


🎨 Pro tip: Use it on component instances to quickly create skeleton loading states that match your actual UI!


Thanks to Bony Fasius Gultom (@itsmebfg) on the community for the free Coffee App mockup used in the plugin visual.

accepted.name: Karl Koch
accepted.description: Currently building DuckDuckGo, Cosmic, Hand››over, and plugins.run.

plugins.tagline: Convert text layers into ghost frames - create redacted or placeholder versions of your designs

plugins.name: Frame Name Organizer
plugins.description:
This is a plugin for changing frame names depending on the layout flow direction. It's helpful for those who doesn’t like to see «‎Frame 1», «‎Frame 2», ..., «‎Frame N» in their design files


There are 4 types of auto-layout flows in Figma: Vertical layout, Horizontal layout, Wrapped layout and Without auto-layout


A replacement pattern is a regular expression for finding necessary frame names for renaming


The plugin allows to apply renaming:

  1. only to selected frames
  2. only to defined flow type of auto-layouts
  3. to all the page frames with any layouts

accepted.name: Elean
accepted.description: Hi! I’m Elena, a product designer. I enjoy creating design systems and building UI kits

plugins.tagline: This is a plugin for changing frame names depending on the layout flow direction

98545.tagline: This is a plugin for changing frame names depending on the layout flow direction

plugins.name: Sectionizer
plugins.description:
Sectionizer automatically organizes frames into sections.


It organizes and rearranges them according to their initial placements and renames them using a specific format. This format includes numbering, an optional parent section name, and an optional custom string that remains consistent across multiple uses of the plugin.


How to use:


Select a group of frames and run the "Sectionize" command. That's it. Anything changes? Run it again!


Add custom names:


To add a custom name and have it persist when running the plugin, just add an asterisk (*) and type whatever you like. For example, "* custom name".


Selection mechanics:


The plugin can be used multiple times as needed by selecting a section, frames within it, or just a group of frames with no parent.


Reusing the plugin:


If you change a frame's name or position, rerunning the plugin will automatically adjust the layout and update the names to reflect these changes.


Settings:


  1. Set custom spacing: Choose your preferred spacing unit for both the section's padding and the space around frames; the default is 80.
  2. Show section's name: Decide whether to include the section's name as part of the frame's names.
plugins.tagline: Sectionizer organizes frames into sections in one command.

plugins.name: WN Helper v1.0 [Release version]
plugins.description:
ATTENTION! This plugin was created for sharing by me and my friends in our special projects. Some of the functions do not work in other documents due to the different organization of layers and components.


Public functions that may be of interest to you:


- Quick creation of frames for creating multiple variants of social network avatars (500x500 size).


- Export the content of any frame to an image for

instant fill insertion for any selected element. (Very useful for copying any frame and pasting it as a background for any of your designs).


- Fast loading of any number of selected elements as PNG images. (Allows you to export individual items to different customer folders faster).


- Changing the background color of the work page (This is convenient for checking the most contrasting background of my work, but this function is already built into Figma by default)


--------------------------------------------------------


My personal functions working in a special project:


- Quick placement of texts with time units (conjugation of words)


- Checking my project (components) for the presence of prohibited (bad) words for search engines


- Quick selection of elements in my components


- Changing the size of texts to fit the required width and height of the element.


- Change component options in a couple of clicks


- Several options for importing and exporting texts to my components.


- Export and import the contents of my components to a CSV file.


- Import and export images and icons to my components.


- Moving and reversing the order of components in my frames.


- Change the colors of the elements.


--------------------------------------------------------


The project has localization in English and Russian, the ability to sort functions for the tasks of the working day and the type of customers, a settings section that helps manage the work of the plugin.


--------------------------------------------------------


Figma is a moderator, I have already submitted this plugin three times for moderation and I hope that I have fixed all its shortcomings.


I added a contact email in the text of this description, in the mail section in the application and also indicated the contact me button in the plugin itself. I also added canvas modification functions for all Figma users so that the plugin would be useful to everyone. I checked it for errors within a few working days and I really hope that you will approve it for publication.

42499.name: WN Helper v1.0 [Release version]
42499.description:
ATTENTION! This plugin was created for sharing by me and my friends in our special projects. Some of the functions do not work in other documents due to the different organization of layers and components.

instant fill insertion for any selected element. (Very useful for copying any frame and pasting it as a background for any of your designs).


- Fast loading of any number of selected elements as PNG images. (Allows you to export individual items to different customer folders faster).


- Changing the background color of the work page (This is convenient for checking the most contrasting background of my work, but this function is already built into Figma by default)


--------------------------------------------------------

--------------------------------------------------------


The project has localization in English and Russian, the ability to sort functions for the tasks of the working day and the type of customers, a settings section that helps manage the work of the plugin.


--------------------------------------------------------


Figma is a moderator, I have already submitted this plugin three times for moderation and I hope that I have fixed all its shortcomings.


I added a contact email in the text of this description, in the mail section in the application and also indicated the contact me button in the plugin itself. I also added canvas modification functions for all Figma users so that the plugin would be useful to everyone. I checked it for errors within a few working days and I really hope that you will approve it for publication.

plugins.name: Spacing Checker (Auto-Fix)
plugins.description:
Make your designs pixel-perfect with Spacing Checker!

This Figma plugin helps you maintain a clean, consistent 4-point grid in your designs by:


✅ Checking alignment – Detects incorrect width, height, gaps, positioning, and padding.

✅ Auto-fixing issues – Snaps everything to the nearest valid grid value.

✅ Quick navigation – Click on errors to instantly highlight the affected element.

✅ Undo Fix – Easily revert any changes if needed.


Simply select a frame or elements, run the check, and ensure everything follows proper spacing rules!


Feedback welcome.

accepted.name: Bas
accepted.description: Product designer with a interest in AI, passionate about frontend development, digital design, animation, and the exciting journey of creating innovative UX

plugins.tagline: 🚀 Ensure perfect spacing with a single click—check, fix, and align effortlessly.

plugins.name: Generative Art Workbench
plugins.description:
Generative Art Workbench is a helpful Figma plugin that simplifies the process of testing and previewing different layer combinations for your generative art projects.


With an intuitive frame naming convention, this plugin allows you to thoroughly experiment with various layers and efficiently generate composite previews inside Figma itself.


By providing a practical solution within Figma's environment, the plugin highly streamlines your workflow and empowers you to quickly achieve the desired results in your generative/derivative style art.


Open sourced on Github
plugins.tagline: A tool to aid in testing generative art being developed through Figma.

plugins.name: DesignFast: Text from Anything (Text from Image, Text from PDF)
plugins.description:
Extract text from any source and transform it into editable Figma designs in one click. Our AI-powered plugin preserves text structure while making it instantly editable in your Figma workspace.


Features:

  1. Text from Image: Extract text from any image with precision.
  2. Text from PDF: Seamlessly convert PDF text to Figma.
  3. Editable Figma Design: Transform extracted content into fully Editable Figma Design.
  4. Privacy-First: Your data stays secure, Not data is stored.


Our mission is to enhance productivity and creativity, making high-level design techniques accessible to all and streamlining the creation of enriching visual content.


More Information

For further details, please visit our official website. https://designfast.io

Extract text from any source and transform it into editable Figma designs in one click. Our AI-powered plugin preserves text structure while making it instantly editable in your Figma workspace.


Features:

  1. Text from Image: Extract text from any image with precision.
  2. Text from PDF: Seamlessly convert PDF text to Figma.
  3. Editable Figma Design: Transform extracted content into fully Editable Figma Design.
  4. Privacy-First: Your data stays secure, Not data is stored.


Our mission is to enhance productivity and creativity, making high-level design techniques accessible to all and streamlining the creation of enriching visual content.


More Information

For further details, please visit our official website. https://designfast.io

manifest.name: DesignFast: Text from Anything (Text from Image, Text from PDF)

134875.tagline: Extract Text to Figma in One Click:  Transform Text into Editable Figma Design

plugins.name: Powerset
plugins.description:
Powerset renders all permutations of a selected instance based on the values of its variant properties. The created combinations can help you QA your component library definitions, or showcase its permutations.


Supports Instance Properties, Layer Visibility Properties and even Exposed Instances!!


Instructions

  1. Select an instance of any component
  2. Toggle the checkboxes on the generated properties table for the desired properties’ values
  3. Note the total variations that will be created based on your selections
  4. Push Create.


Tips

  • FrameName – A new frame is created with name 'Powerset/$LayerName'. This will be updated for the same instance every time the plugin is run. Any changes to the auto-layout properties of this frame will be maintained on each run.
  • Lock Toggle – Every time you select an instance, this plugin will regenerate its properties’ table. Toggle the lock icon to lock the properties table on the selected instance.
plugins.tagline: Create all permutations of your components. Use them to Analyse, Document and QA your components.

plugins.name: snake_case layer_name
plugins.description:
Make your layer name to snake_case


If snake_case is the best format for your layer naming and you have problem with that, then your suffering will be ended today.


Just select the layer you want to make it as snake_case, then run the plugin from the plugin menu or hit command + "/" then search the plugin name.


Enjoy,

Banyu Rachman

accepted.name: Banyu Rachman
accepted.description: UX Engineer. Part of Blibli Design.

plugins.name: MATE
plugins.description:
Automate boring tasks

Tell MATE to rename variables with real smartness, apply random opacity for selected items, pick 3 items from the selection, etc, etc. MATE supports you in your daily, time-consuming tasks.


Your own little tools

With MATE you can create your own little tools that are not available as plugins.


Generative (randomized) Design

Generative is all about mass editing and randomizing hundreds of elements. Impossible to do manually, easy with MATE.


Scripts

Save responses from MATE as scripts and run them any time - without roundtrip to the AI.


Support and feedback:

Email: support@omata.io

Web: www.omata.io/mate-figma


Follow for more:

https://twitter.com/plugisto

accepted.name: Plugisto
accepted.description: Developing tools for designers. Creator of Adobe plugins Omata (@omata_design), Arranger, Xray and Delaunoi.

plugins.tagline: Let Al do the boring tasks for you. You focus on the fun stuff.

plugins.name: File Organizer
plugins.description:
🚀 Streamlined Organization:

Tired of manually creating pages for different project types? Say goodbye to the hassle! File Organizer automates the process, categorizing your Figma files into dedicated pages based on project types such as Sprint files and Design system files.


🎨 Tailored for Designers:

Created by designers, for designers, this plugin understands the unique needs of creative professionals. It not only simplifies file organization but also enhances collaboration by providing an intuitive structure that resonates with design workflows.


🌐 Universal Compatibility:

Whether you're a solo designer or part of a collaborative team, File Organizer seamlessly integrates into your Figma environment. Compatible with a wide range of project scales and complexities, this plugin adapts to your unique needs, ensuring a frictionless experience for all users.


📈 Boost Productivity:

By automating the task of file organization, File Organizer empowers you to focus on what you do best – designing! Spend less time navigating through cluttered files and more time bringing your creative visions to life.


🚨 Easy to Use:

No steep learning curves here! File Organizer boasts a user-friendly interface, making it accessible to both Figma beginners and seasoned professionals. With just a few clicks, watch as your Figma workspace transforms into a well-organized haven.


🌟 Elevate Collaboration:

Enhance collaboration within your team by ensuring everyone is on the same page—literally! With File Organizer, project-specific files are consolidated, fostering a collaborative environment where communication and creativity can thrive.


🔗 How to Get Started:

Install File Organizer from the Figma Community.

Select the files you want to organize.

Run the plugin and let the magic happen!


Take the leap into a more organized and efficient Figma experience with File Organizer. Install now and watch as your design process becomes a breeze!

accepted.name: Mahmoud Ahmed
accepted.description: Digital Product Designer

plugins.tagline: Organize Pages by Context or AI, and Auto-Fill Placeholders with AI

plugins.name: All Relevant Infos, Please
plugins.description:
A fairly simple plugin that shows you All Relevant Infos when you're in dev mode. Having only view access to a file hides some important information on layers, like e. g. min and max width or the actual Auto Layout gap. When using this plugin, you see these infos in the right sidebar, grouped by categories.


Note: This is currently in Beta and only supports Frame, Auto Layout, Constraints, and basic Typography properties. Let me know what other properties you would like to have displayed.
plugins.tagline: View min and max width, shadows, and other hidden properties

plugins.name: Data Frame
plugins.description:
Data Frame automates mail merge in Figma by allowing you to import CSV data and automatically populate design templates with personalized content.


This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select multiple frames, groups, or component instances (as design template)
  2. Upload a CSV file containing your data
  3. Map CSV columns to text layers in your selected template
  4. Automatically generate multiple instances of your template, each populated from each row of data in the CSV file.


Example use:

  1. Business Cards: Create a sleek business card template and instantly generate cards for your entire team by importing employee details from a CSV file.
  2. Event Badges: Design a conference badge layout once, then use Data Frame to populate it with attendee information, creating unique badges for hundreds of participants in seconds.
  3. Order Packing Slips: Design a packing slip template and instantly generate customized slips for each order, complete with customer details, order numbers, and item lists from your e-commerce platform's CSV export.
  4. Personalized Email Designs: Design an email template in Figma and use Data Frame to visualize how it will look for different subscribers, importing names, account details, and custom offers from your CRM's CSV export.


Perfect for creating dynamic mockups, personalised designs, or at scale documents. Data Frame saves time and ensures accuracy when working with large datasets in your Figma projects.
plugins.tagline: Automate personalization by merging a design template with the .csv data source.

104354.name: Data Frame
104354.description:
Data Frame automates mail merge in Figma by allowing you to import CSV data and automatically populate design templates with personalized content.


This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select multiple frames, groups, or component instances (as design template)
  2. Upload a CSV file containing your data
  3. Map CSV columns to text layers in your selected template
  4. Automatically generate multiple instances of your template, each populated from each row of data in the CSV file.


Example use:

  1. Business Cards: Create a sleek business card template and instantly generate cards for your entire team by importing employee details from a CSV file.
  2. Event Badges: Design a conference badge layout once, then use Data Frame to populate it with attendee information, creating unique badges for hundreds of participants in seconds.
  3. Order Packing Slips: Design a packing slip template and instantly generate customized slips for each order, complete with customer details, order numbers, and item lists from your e-commerce platform's CSV export.
  4. Personalized Email Designs: Design an email template in Figma and use Data Frame to visualize how it will look for different subscribers, importing names, account details, and custom offers from your CRM's CSV export.


Perfect for creating dynamic mockups, personalised designs, or at scale documents. Data Frame saves time and ensures accuracy when working with large datasets in your Figma projects.
104354.release_notes:
- ENHANCEMENT: The system now supports comma(,) or semicolon(;) separators/delimiters in the .csv file.
- ENHANCEMENT: When a cell data is empty, the text layer which was defined to merge with, will be hidden.
- ENHANCEMENT: Updated labels for better understanding of the steps, limitations and capabilities.
104354.tagline: Automate personalization by merging a design template with the .csv data source.
